collection.openText: ...And the thirst would never truly be quenched.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When 6 employees die inside the facility, the Qliphoth Counter will lower. However, deaths caused by Execution Bullets were not recognized.
When the work result of Instinct or Attachment was bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work result of Attachment was good, the Qliphoth Counter increased.애착 작업 결과가 좋음일 경우 클리포트 카운터가 상승하였다.

Committing work with an employee with less than 3 Fortitude increased the amount of PE-Boxes produced. Doing this results in $0 "feeding" off of the employee(Referred to as O-01-34-1), increasing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed for the day.
Committing Attachment work higher than rank 4 with an employee with more than 4 Fortitude increased the amount of PE-Boxes produced. $0 fed off of these employees as well.

$0 starts with 3 'Blood' at the start of the day. 1 'Blood' is gained when $0 fed off of an employee, and 1 'Blood' is lost every minute. When 'Blood' fell to 0, the Qliphoth Counter dropped to 0. The same happened when 'Blood' reached 5. The wine glass it holds changes appearance depending on how much 'Blood' it has.
When the Qliphoth Counter reached 0, O-01-34-1 changed into ████████ Those killed by $0 or ████████ turned into ████.
